statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_data;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, date_collected FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM temperature_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, date_collected FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 20;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE date_collected BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_readings > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature < 10 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, date FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM TemperatureData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_details;
SELECT sensor_id, start_date, end_date FROM data_analysis WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_details WHERE longitude < 0
SELECT analysis_id, sensor_id, start_date, end_date FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT analysis_id, sensor_id, start_date, end_date FROM data_analysis WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, recorded_at FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, institution FROM ClimateResearcher WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT sensor_id, start_date, end_date FROM SensorDeployment WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, recorded_at FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT * FROM SensorDeployment WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM ClimateResearcher ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM Temperature_Data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM Temperature_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM Researcher WHERE institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT * FROM Climate_Data WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM Sensor WHERE location='Lab A';
SELECT name, institution FROM Researcher WHERE institution='University A';
SELECT climate_id, location, average_temperature FROM Climate_Data WHERE location='City X' AND year=2020 ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, conclusion FROM Analysis_Result WHERE researcher_id=1001 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
